message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $11,500.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a price closer to my initial offer. Would you be willing to meet halfway at $10,750?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of your product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,500.
